sentences.sentence: Localization does not necessarily mean that to vulgarize it, so its better to stick to high-end line.

sentences.sentence: All of us who professionally use the mass media are the shapers of society. We can vulgarize that society.
sentences.translation: 我们这些专业运用大众媒介的人都是社会的形塑者。

sentences.sentence: We review the recent academic discussion of the medical vulgarize, and raise the different concepts about pre-science, science, pseudoscience and counter-science.
sentences.translation: 简要回顾几年来关于医学庸俗化的学术讨论，明确提出应从本质上对前科学、科学、伪科学和反科学这四个相关概念加以区分。
